projects.cryptoscan: Crypto tracker with price analysis for 1000+ coins
projects.vkcrm: SPA test project for VK: manage employee records with infinite scroll, modals, adaptive form fields, and a responsive data table
projects.weathernow: SPA with Mobile-First approach, tracks the weather and lunar cycles at all points of the world
projects.hrcrm: SPA project for HR: application storing different employee data, retrieving from the backend and fully adaptive tables and form fields for different data
projects.todoApp: Simple Todo app, had nothing to do, decided to make a nice minimalistic app

about.imdevfrom: I’m a self-taught front-end developer based in Moscow, Russia. I can develop responsive websites from scratch and raise them into modern user-friendly web experiences
about.mycreative: Transforming my creativity and knowledge into a websites has been my passion for over a year. I have been helping various clients to establish their presence online. I always strive to learn about the newest technologies and frameworks.
about.ilikespring: I like spring because it's a time of renewal and fresh beginnings
about.ilikepizza: I enjoy pizza, especially with a variety of toppings
about.sleepdeprived: I survive on 3 hours of sleep and ill-advised optimism.
about.playcs: I enjoy playing CS2 in my free time, and I'm 10 lvl faceit
about.dancebadly: I dance like nobody's watching… and trust me, that's for the best xD
about.ilikecars: I have a passion for cars and my dream it's Tyota GT86
about.eternalsunset: I love sunsets — they remind me that our planet, too, is a stellar wanderer, racing through the dark with a lantern in its hands.

contacts.iminterested: I’m interested in freelance opportunities. However, if you have other request or question, don’t hesitate to contact me
